website_summaries.verdict: It tastes like a shake and keeps you full for hours, but it's a little more difficult to mix.
pros: Keeps you feeling full for hours
cons: May get a little clumpy on you if not mixed thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Provided scoop delivers 1/3 too muich product and thus only 36 servings per canister.  Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I discovered that there must be a lot of settling of the powder because the canister appears to be about half full when first opened. . I did not get the listed number of servings per canister so I weighed how much the provided green scoop delivers and discovered that it provided 1/3 more product by weight than what was labeled on the "serving size". So just fill the scoop 2/3 full or use a smaller scoop....that is what I did. I wrote the company but they did not seem to think it was a problem. I did. When you use the correct amount it mixes and tastes much better.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bee

customer_reviews.title: COMBAT PRO vs SYNTHA-6 (Vanilla)
customer_reviews.text: My personal opinions: They both taste very well and are not over powering in flavor. I always get vanilla because I don't like too sweet of a taste. This also allows me to add any flavor I want. I add a serving of yogurt to the one scoop of protein in a regular shaker bottle and they both mix very well. I use water and not milk. I like them both. I have attached photos so you can compare and assist in your purchasing decisions. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: House OF Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Of all the protein powders I have tried, and there have been many. This is by far the best. The best in satisfaction and by far the best VALUE. I've noticed a great difference in my stamina,loss of weight and meal satisfaction. I go to the gym every day and work as a bartender/server one day. Oh yes and I'm 80yrs. Old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: my go to protien
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to protein has been for years. Started off with chocolate and for some reason can't find it anywhere switched over to Strawberry and I absolutely love it. I tried other proteins and this one wins. I personally mixed with 2% milk and it taste like Nestle Quik. Not bad with water either I just prefer milk. You have to shake your pretty good and let it settle for a couple minutes before drinking
customer_reviews.author: MR DELICATH

customer_reviews.title: Experienced awful gas and diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: After eliminating every other possible source, i finally realized MusclePhart was causing the problem. I recently switched to MusclePharm Combat because it was so much cheaper than my go-to (Gold Standard Whey by ON). Over time i noticed that i was experiencing horrible flatulence and diarrhea daily. I eliminated all other possible sources that could be causing the distress, i.e., dairy, fish oils, gluten, etc... but nothing helped. I am not even finishing this 5lb container of Strawberry flavored whey. It's not worth the trouble! I'm going back to ON even if it does cost a little extra. Spare yourself the stink and pass on this supp.
customer_reviews.author: RaWard501

customer_reviews.title: Milk chocolate taste great
customer_reviews.text: Big thing with protein powders for me is taste, low in carbs and sugar, and finally how many scoops to achieve the said protein. The one taste great (milk chocolate) without that aftertaste. It doesn't overload you with carbs or sugar to achieve the taste like others do (BSN). And lastly it's one scoop per serving with is a plus since it will last you longer, there might be cheaper options out there like EAS but you use double the amount to get the same result. So in the end it cost you more money in the long run. Will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: bmo37

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than ON Plato
customer_reviews.text: Got the strawberry flavor in 5lbs. Better value than the Platinum ON supercharged strawberry for 3.5 lbs. This mixes a little clumpier than ON but I can live with that. Otherwise, the flavor is good and it's actually less sweet tasting which I like. Nutritional facts are comparable with a minor increase in cholesterol. For the price savings I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a EAS user until they recently discontinued their entire line of EAS products so I tried MusclePharm 100% Whey Isolate, Pure Isolate Protein Powder and instantly was hooked. I've tried both chocolate and vanilla and they both taste AWESOME!!! They mix very well and pack 25 grams of protein into each serving. Here is a little something that I tried that tasted phenomenal. I made french toast for breakfast and instead of putting syrup on it with all that added sugar I sprinkled some of the vanilla flavored protein powder on it and covered it for a quick minute on low heat and WOW what a taste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST Tasting Protein Powder By A Mile!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I have only tried about 4 different brands of protein powder before. With that said, this is hands down the best tasting I have tried! I have never been able to drink protein powder with water before, but this one I can and actually enjoy the taste! It mixes easily with a shaker bottle or in the blender with other ingredients to make a smoothie (peanut butter, oats, milk, bananas). It is very sweet, might be too sweet for others, but I have a definite sweet tooth so I love it. Placing an order today for my 2nd tub!
customer_reviews.author: tBERGz

customer_reviews.title: Best 100% Whey Powder
customer_reviews.text: Powder is great tasting and mixes easy. I have tried many different brands of 100% whey powder and this is by far the best tasting(vanilla) and the fastest dissolving powder to date. When looking at the ingredient listing, whey is isolate is the first to be listed followed by concentrate. High quality. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Tasted great and works great
customer_reviews.text: Tasted phenomenal. Probably my greatest thing to say about the product. It helped me in replacing some of my meals as well as giving me the extra push in protein consumption I needed to build muscle effectively. I have gained a total of 2 pounds in muscle after using an entire tub of this stuff. I would recommend to anyone, but I think for the future I will be focused on products offering more versatile ingredients such as amino acids. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Top Of The Line Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used other MP products but had not used this one so thought I would give it a try. It tastes great and definitely helps in the recovery process after a hard workout. I have no hesitation recommending this product of any other MP product. I like the notice that it has been tested for illegal substances and was negative for them. This is very important if you are competing at a high level. My wife is a professional volleyball player and uses it. She has no problems passing her drug screens. Give this and other MP products a try. They are products you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: stan simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking to try something new since the other two protein powders I usually buy went up in price. Decided to try this one based on the price and reviews. Maybe it’s just me, but I’m not a fan. It did not dissolve at all, even after shaking once every few hours and then drinking at work; there were still some VERY large clumps. Also, I was not a fan of the vanilla flavor - something about it just tasted off. Maybe using a blender and mixing into a smoothie would be better, but with just water, milk, or juice, this one isn’t very palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, taste and product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and the value is great for the money. I have no complaints about the product. However, I had to discontinue use because my body was reacting to the Whey Protein by giving me G.I. problems. This powder dissolves good, tastes great and has a lot of benefits to it. Sad I can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Howe

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the absolute worst protein powder I have ever had. You cannot mix it up with a spoon, it just clumps up into blobs and it tastes horrible and I am not picky when it comes to flavor. I would return this if it wasn't such a hassle. I usually buy a different brand but thought I'd change it up a bit and try something different. Mistake! Needless to say I will never buy this again. I would give zero stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein i have had in the last 8 years of training! mixes easy goes down smooth & light
customer_reviews.text: This is my new staple, cost efficient and best tasting"Cappuccino flavor" i have had in a long time especially enhanced with the use of Milk, great amount of servings for the price , solid amount of protein ,blends perfectly as it has no clumps even when using 3 scoops at a time , highly recommended , having to maintain 250 lb's this definitely helps , id recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: 🎅

customer_reviews.title: Product Changed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times in the past. This last order the product has changed. I buy 100% whey, vanilla flavor. Both the flavor and the consistency of the whey have changed negatively. There is less flavor and the whey is more grainy or sandy in texture. It does not mix as well either. This will be my last purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great to me!
customer_reviews.text: I combine mine with milk in a blender and it does not clump up or is chunky. I have yet to try it in a blender bottle. It is advertised as 27 servings. I thought it tasted on the sweet side but tasted just like chocolate milk to me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well, tastes good, feels good.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some negative reviews saying it doesn't mix well or gives people diarrhea. Have not had these problems. I can drink a protein shake with breakfast and have had no problems. I've drank this on an empty stomach and digested it fine. The powder is smooth, mixes very quickly, and is quick to clean up. Flavor is good. It's not overbearing, I have not tried it with milk or anything but water but I assume you could mix it just fine with other ingredients. With water it's not too thick or thin in the mix. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Seth A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whey Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of this whey protein. I've bought it for a few years now trying multiple flavors, and I am never disappointed. The powder mixes with ease, and every single flavor tastes great with water. I even use it to make oatmeal, and it tastes amazing. The biggest perk is the price though. I have yet to find a leaner cleaner protein for a better price per serving. You really can't beat this, and it's clear why MP is the standard.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Beware of subscription price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Beware of subscription... You don't lock in the price of the product when you subscribe on a monthly basis... The price fluxuates each month any sometimes you'll pay more for a product that isn't as high quality as some other ones.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet
customer_reviews.text: I picked this because it was recommended by my trainer and it had less sodium and sugar than my current protein powder. But I found it to be very sweet. Probably won’t order it again. UPDATE -- after using half the container, I would say the sweetness doesn't bother me anymore. But it is a bit chalky. Hard to compare to other protein powders as I only have one in my house at a time, and haven't used them extensively before this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: My brother introduced me to this brand when we were talking about which protein powders are good and which ones arent. To be honest its great it has very good flavor and Ive tried cookies and creme as well as this flavor and both are delicious which is an important aspect in the protein powders. If they are gross then its gonna be more like a chore to drink it instead of something that can be both helpful to muscle growth and delicious. I have had nothing but positive experiences with this brand and I plan on sticking with Musclepharm as theres no other brand that Ive seen that can match the flavor and consistency of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I would compare this protein to some of the higher end whey proteins out there like Gold Standard but a fraction of the price. The flavor is good and the overall quality is great too. The only negative I can think of is the powder doesn't mix quite as easy as a Gold Standard but you can just shake your blender bottle a few more times and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Mixes terribly
customer_reviews.text: I usually enjoy this protein, however this order I got chocolate instead of the vanilla. The vanilla mixes great, however this chocolate version mixes horribly. It just clumps up and makes it almost undrinkable. Maybe it was just a bad batch but beware. Of course I ordered before I ran out of vanilla and I am stuck paying for this because return window is gone. Worst mixing protein I have ever had and been using whey protein for over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Condron

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great, Less Filling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product accidentally, thinking it was the Combat Protein powder that comes from 5 different protein sources- which I had been using all year. This protein mixes easily and tastes great, like all the other Muscle Pharm products I’ve used. However I will say that without a doubt this product doesn’t keep me full like the 5-sources protein version. I am frequently hungry after taking this, whereas when I took the other one I felt satisfied far longer. This will get the job done, but when it’s finished I’m going back to the other Combat Protein.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TASTE
customer_reviews.text: This is my first protein bought product and I was certainly skeptical in the beginning. I had purchased chocolate and assumed that it would be chalky in texture or gross in taste. I was certainly glad to find out that it’s absolutely amazing! I’ve been mixing 2 scoops with whole milk in my shaker bottle and it tastes like chocolate milk it’s SOO good! I’m so glad I purchased this protein powder and will definitely purchase more once mine runs out. HIGHLY recommend purchasing it. Not sure how the other flavors are but I LOVE chocolate everything and this one is certainly amazing :).
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great product - advice about scoop size
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because this is all around a great product with far better ingredients than most protein powders. HOWEVER, the scoop is NOT 33 grams as stated on the package. The scoop it's more like 60-70 grams, and I know this because I compared it to another protein powder scoop I have that is 65 grams and this one is around the same size. I'd recommend using about half a scoop of you want a true one serving. Aside from that, awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decreasing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave two stars because this product was good at one point. I started routinely purchasing and drinking Muscle Pharm Whey Combat about 5 years ago and was pleased with the results and flavor. However, I have noticed maybe in the past two years that the consistency and taste has been changing and falling in quality. I can no longer tolerate the flavor of MusclePharm Vanilla and will be switching to a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Blynnsa

customer_reviews.title: Very low in sugar
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful protein supplement. I’m not in front of it right now, but I remember thinking this is the lowest amount of sugar per serving I’ve ever had in a protein drink. It also tastes great with just water or almond milk. If you use regular milk with a little ice it’s just like having the best chocolate milk shake. I do that when I get cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle tannehill

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry is Tasty and Mixes Well
customer_reviews.text: The strawberry flavor is really good and somewhat mild. I don't have a mixer bottle yet but the powder mixed well in a cup using a fork to whisk it. I don't have much prior experience with protein powders so for now I'm judging based on taste and ease of preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton A.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck protein powder in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: So I checked each serving cost of the top Whey Protein Powders and also checked the Protein per serving and the Sugar content, this product was the overall winner, it doesn't comes with a scoop but that's no deal breaker for me, I just use a regular spoon for a serving of about 5g. I make my protein shake with skim milk and the flavor is great, amazing supplementation for the days that I need a boost and I want a tasty dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, however has many junk ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: This powder tastes really good, and mixes well, but that's about it. Bought this when I wasn't as careful about reading the label. First of all it isn't pure whey protein isolate, it is also has concentrate (the not-so-good kind) and has many "natural and artificial flavors" with quite an interesting array of random junk fillers such as SUCRALOSE. This a standard protein powder that looks at flavor etc more than the actual quality of the ingredients they use. The next protein powder I will buy will be from Muscle Feast or Levels, check them out, you will see the difference in the label. Don't be afraid to spend a few extra bucks on a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan Venkateshwar

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Shake - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great spec's, fair price, shipped quickly, no problems. Mixes easily with water. Vanilla, Strawberry or Chocolate - all their flavors taste great. I keep re-ordering this excellent post-workout shake form MusclePharm. Really good products from very reliable company. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Back

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great....
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this protein powder. I do use powdered peanut butter to add more flavor. It is cheaper than ON's Protein powder and has about the same ingredients. Also it is good for people with irritable stomachs. Great product from MP
customer_reviews.author: BazookaTooth805

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value, but it gave me bad gas!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is a great value and it tastes delicious, but it is giving me terrible gas! I read that other people have had the same side effect. Unfortunately, I wont be buying it again due to the bad gas. If 100% whey protein does not bother your gut, then you might be fine using it. It tastes real good!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it, most Wheys have more or less the same ingredients. This is a quality product with regards to what’s in it, so nothing to criticize here. Since the differentiating factor is taste and texture for me though, I was not happy at all. It is disgustingly sweet, to the point that when I mixed it with water instead of milk, it made me gag. It also tends to form clots, even though I use a shaker bottle with one of the easy-shake balls. I work out a lot, and drink 2 protein shakes a day, so I want them to taste at least ok. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Dannhoff

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of protein powder. I have been using the vanilla for years. I wanted to try something a little different and opted for the cookies and cream. it is a little sweeter, but doesn't really taste too different if I mix it with multiple other items. The quality of this protein powder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson W

customer_reviews.title: Puffs up in blender when making smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, but but puffs up (ie. turns to foam) in the blender when usinf in smoothies, which is a deal breaker for me. I wont order again.
customer_reviews.author: raebug

customer_reviews.title: Instant gainz, what's really in this?
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend got into my protein while I was at work, tried once... She became combative all day and decided to go to the gym for the first time in months which resulted in instant gainz. She sent this picture after of her newly shredded arms... On a side note, she won at all strategy games played that game night... Not sure if correlated... This protein turned her into super woman over night. What's really in this product?
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Darby

customer_reviews.title: What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: Tastes pretty good. Love how soluble it is. I always wonder though, is whatever they use to sweeten this stuff really ok for the body? I have my doubts. But hey, it tastes good, it's easy af to mix and it don't bloat me.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super constitution
customer_reviews.text: Powder is clumped together. Must have had moisture seep in along the way. I can barely get the product out of the serving scoop. I've tried this product before in a different flavor. Substance then why dry easy to pour mix powder. Don't understand the problem for this batch
customer_reviews.author: That'sAll_Folks

customer_reviews.title: I do love this product . However, you are misrepresenting it. This produst hast 2 carbs,
customer_reviews.text: I am all about the TRUTH in all things. You are doing yourself a disservice by promoting this product having 0 carbs. This is inaccurate ! It is a great product with a great taste that is filling and nutritious. However, it has 2 carbs per scoop. I have lost 26 lbs. within a 5 month period and doing it the healthy way .Every carb counts when you want to take back your health and life. Thank you and I hope this gets to your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A Knight

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for awhile now. sometime you can get these very cheap under $30 so i usually stock up on them. They taste almost too sweet with very little sugar added which makes me wonder sometime. But great product for a very low price if you wait around.
customer_reviews.author: Fraka987

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awful protein shake
customer_reviews.text: This was listed for a good price for a 5lb tub so I thought I’d give it a shot. This is by far the worst protein powder I’ve tried. Shaking/stirring leaves clumps - must be blended. Flavor itself is a very artificial and excessively sweet milk chocolate. I’d stick with Dymatize, Optimum, BSN, and most other powders out on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Turretin71

customer_reviews.title: Great recovery for muscles, bad cappuccino
customer_reviews.text: This great protein powder had me feeling more recovered than ever. Really helped my muscles developed. I’m on a 7 day workout plan and have started a bulk, this powder has definitely helped. The only bad thing is the taste of the cappuccino, it taste like a sugary cup of coffee. And as a person who enjoys only a little bit of milk in their coffee, I didn’t like this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: in for a shock with this whey protein
customer_reviews.text: I was rather shock when I tried this protein product, for i was thinking there is no way at this price the taste will be very good or blend at all, But the flavor is awesome and it blends easily in water and milk. I will buy this product again and in other flavors as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, seems effrective, but could be more water soluble
customer_reviews.text: I use protein after my workouts and before bed. The dosage before bed is just protein powder and water. I find that this product does not dissolve as well in water as the ON I used previously. It is nicely priced for the amount of protein it delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Lester M. Siglin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awesome (I usually hate the way protein powder tastes). I put 10 oz of milk with one scoop of mix with 3-5 iced cubes in a shaker cup and shake it up! The ice cubes help mix it and super cold. Helps with my muscle soreness from exercising and work (landscaper).
customer_reviews.author: Lonks

customer_reviews.title: The smell is a bit weird. price is great.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Optimum Nutrition whey and I tried to purchase a cheaper protein shake. I have to say the price was more than great but I feel a smell which is not very pleasant. This is maybe expected for the price. The taste, however, is good.
customer_reviews.author: Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent texture & flavor, increased cost
customer_reviews.text: This was our favorite protein having purchased 10 lbs per month for the last 2 years for adequate protein intake and great flavor. Unfortunately, the texture and flavor consistency has changed dramatically recently, which likely speaks to a change in formula and quality. The price also increased 26%! No longer worth it to us. Finding other options. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: W. K.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate milk flavor taste good to me & mixes well
customer_reviews.text: I've already tryed some other flavors of MP's whey, to me it seems like I achieve good gains all around, so what I care about mostly when buying this brand is that the taste is good to me and that it's easy to mix with water and milk in my regular shaker bottle. This chocolate milk flavor one checks both boxes, would buy again when prices drop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average Protein
customer_reviews.text: Very average protein. The flavors and ingredients are okay, but it does not mix very will with milk, water, or almond milk. However, I bought this 4lb tub on black Friday for 27$. You can't beat the value. I wish I'd bought more at that price. This isn't the first or last time I'll be buying musclepharm products
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bornitz

customer_reviews.title: A good value proteib
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like watered down chocolate milk. Which may sound terrible but honestly, compared to other brands that have very similar macros, Combat powder taste so much better. I’ve actually been using combat powder for several years now and I still rank it as one of my favorites. Especially at the price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: 25 gms in each scoop
customer_reviews.text: Relatively low calorie whey prdotein. You get 25 gms of protein in each scoop and the taste is really very good. I selected 'cookies and cream' and have enjoyed the protein, the full feeling it gives a person and the taste. Good product
customer_reviews.author: al conner

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Still room for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Peanut Butter Chocolate flavor. Its like drinking a liquid Reese's peanut butter cup. It mixes well with water (glass and a spoon, or water bottle with a spring ball). Price on Amazon's the best that I've seen. Supposed MMA trainers use this brand. The only minus is that I'm unclear whether or not this is acting as a placebo. I'm still experimenting around with my workouts, food, and protein powder intake. Other brands were clear cut to me. However, don't be discouraged as I'm a harsh rater, and 5-starts means its damn-near perfect. I could use a bit more calories in each of these servings. I'll just supplement my supplement with food.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lui

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using MusclePharm brand for over a year and haven’t had any reason to switch. Mixing in a cup isn’t ideal, but it mixes well protein shaker bottles. Flavor is about the same as any other brand on average.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Pandev

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I just started making protein ice cream to supplement my diet. This stuff is as good as I remember. I did protein shakes years ago and this was the brand I used. The vanilla is so good. I do low carb and it is perfect for my macros.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix well AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out for over 20 years. I normally use a optimum nutrition why but I decided to give this a go. The flavor isn't bad but this protein doesn't mix well at all...AT ALL. Its clumpy and chunky whereas optimum mixes instantaneously. I will never buY this again. I'll stick with the #1 selling protein, optimum nutrition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better protein shakes I’ve tasted. It has a great content as well, meaning the sugar and calories are not super high as in others yet the taste is still very good even with water only. I would definitely buy again but maybe in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: A. Apostolov

customer_reviews.title: Quality whey for quality price
customer_reviews.text: This whey is very good whey it has a protein percentage very similar to top brand whey's like optimum nutrition. It is not instantized like ON so it is a bit fluffier and less dense. I got the vanilla and it is very tasty,although I'm sure the chocolate would be too. A great protein for a good price and they have been tested to actually contain 25g of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Rsave7

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and the cost is good too. We used it for after workouts and also for our son who likes protein shakes and is on the small side for weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: It used to be one of my favorite protein powder few years back but now it feels like there is too much added sugar in it. I am not able to complete the drink even with one scoop of combat whey.
customer_reviews.author: Naren

customer_reviews.title: best taste and value
customer_reviews.text: i researched a LOT. bought several. this is not only delicious but an amazing price. i have vanilla. i can't speak for any other flavors, but this is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy pal.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a hurry, should've paid more attention to the ingredients and nutrition. This will work okay but wont buy again, not to say this is bad just not to my standards. Tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different brands for Whey Proteins. MP Combat is one of my favorites. I go between ON and MP Combat.
customer_reviews.author: NYCPizza

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla depends on batch
customer_reviews.text: First tub was a fine powder, mixed well, and tasted just like vanilla ice cream. Second tub was not as fine, stuck to the blender and clumped up into little semi gritty balls, and had an offputting artificial taste. They both had the same expiration date of 5/2022.
customer_reviews.author: JabzXtreme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: I would compare this protein to some of the higher end whey proteins out there like Gold Standard but a fraction of the price. The flavor is good and the overall quality is great too. The only negative I can think of is the powder doesn't mix quite as easy as a Gold Standard but you can just shake your blender bottle a few more times and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: LBWVU

customer_reviews.title: Beware of wrong flavors
customer_reviews.text: Around my 6th order and I just recieved a wrong batch. Label says vanilla but the flavor is of something different - taste like coffee mix with vanilla . Idk. It’s great when it’s right.
customer_reviews.author: joy roster

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best tasting and mixing out there.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried cap, choc, cookies, and vanilla. Love them all except the vanilla casein. It tasted like chalk. I'll stick to ON vanilla casein. That stuff is my favorite and worth the extra. For the usual whey I stick with these guys. Cheaper and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: The Lords Hand (core gamer)

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and value
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, always take my protein after a workout! Got some compliments my body looking toned up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting whey protein
customer_reviews.text: Period. And I have tried a lot. Packs quite some protein per scoop, and it's probably worth more than it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome protien. Blends very smooth and easily. Doesn't clump up. We have been using muscle pharm products for several years now. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: LILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, great product, great value! I have tried many protein shakes. I tried this one because it was so cost effective. I blend this with spinach, frozen blueberries and a half of a banana. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: John & Kati

customer_reviews.title: Good protein not that great taste
customer_reviews.text: muscle pharm protein has been tested and shown its not amino spiked that's why I buy it. The chocolate flavor is pretty bad in my opinion there's hardly any flavor to it it's pretty bland. walmarts brand tastes better. The cookies and cream mp protein blend wasn't bad. I will try a different flavor next time
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well, tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Very dense and fluffy powder. I wouldn't say it tastes like cream, but more so cookies and icing. I like to put almond milk and cinnamon in mine sometimes, tastes like a cinnamon bun.
customer_reviews.author: Knurlgirl

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite protein ever
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein ever! I've tried so many different brands and have compared its overall taste, performance, and results. MP products is the winner for sure. It tastes exactly like Nestle chocolate milk when mixed with Almond milk or regular milk. I love blending it with a frozen banana, 1-2 scoops of MP combat, ice, almond butter and almond milk as a late night snack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting whey proteins. I've had musclemilk, ON strawberry flavors and this one is by far superior. If u like to add milk to your whey- this ends up tasting like a gourmet strawberry milk shake. Super easy to mix (even with just water) and even easier to drink and digest.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, good value.
customer_reviews.text: The only criticism I have is that it's a little bit of work to get it to dissolve fully. A word of warning, though: this is a HUGE canister. Like, the size of a toddler. I'm just saying.
customer_reviews.author: John Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to ON
customer_reviews.text: Same or better ingredients than my old gold-standard ON powder, but at a much better price. Flavor is much better, though ON has them beat in flavor variety.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbandfan

customer_reviews.title: 12$ price increase?
customer_reviews.text: I go through 5 lbs. a month and I have to say, the last two orders weighed less than 5 lbs. right out of the box, did not mix well and had clumps in the bottom of the last order. Also a price increase of 12$ from the last order (January 11, 2019). Think it’s time to find a new brand although, I was impressed with the quality just can’t deal with the issues. ** update now only 35$ but a pound less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nausea and skin flushing side effects, taste is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over 15 brands of whey protein but this one will give me a feeling of nausea within minutes and causes my skin to flush. It took me a few times to realize what the cause was and each time I wasn't just absolutely sick. Still, the side effects just aren't worth the protein intake for me. The flavoring is also super artificial and just plain gross.
customer_reviews.author: RiAnne C.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: There are some different sellers of this same product and same size container. This was the best value for the money. Flavor is good. Not sure about the ingredient quality because I have no way of telling but it seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: good product,  helpful to maintain that protein level
customer_reviews.text: good product but sometimes costco sells it cheaper. I hope they can bring the price down on Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I do two scoops every morning with less water than it calls for mixes well taste great
customer_reviews.text: Great product I started using Muscle Pharm the last week of October 2017 as of today's date I've lost 147 pounds that's right 147 pounds I eat healthy and I have a protein shake every morning with my oatmeal it's delicious in my opinion you won't find a better product
customer_reviews.author: Willijo

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla is awful
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak for the vanilla since it's all I've tried from their flavor lineup.... The taste is horrendous and makes it hard to drink (I usually mix a scoop into my coffee or drink it with water if I need some extra protein throughout the day). The powder mixes well, which is a positive however, I cannot get over the taste. The 5lb tub was quite challenging to get through
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tasted like cough syrup
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this before and it tasted like fresh strawberries. Super good. I ordered it this previous time and it seems the ingredients have changed. It is thick and tastes like cough syrup. I won't be ordering this flavor again. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Good when mixed with milk
customer_reviews.text: Good when mixed with milk, water, or (my personal favorite) non-fat yogurt. I got the milk chocolate flavor, and when mixed with yogurt it's almost like eating a chocolate pudding. Decent sized amount for good price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good but result is not great
customer_reviews.text: All right it is protein but can not change any my weight and muscle after all. Just taste was super great for me. I will drink it becose of taste, but not for a result
customer_reviews.author: irakli

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein
customer_reviews.text: Good protein, no BCAAs advertised though so I'm not sure if they are in there in the amounts typical of whey concentrate. Doesn't really matter though since I add BCAAs anyway. Mixes well too.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Giving it 3 star
customer_reviews.text: It's really sweet and dont dissolve ppl give it a good rating so decided to give it a try. I'm going back to BSN and ON Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Normal People

customer_reviews.title: Best price for whey
customer_reviews.text: Use to get gold standard whey but realized that this was the sensually just as good of a product but cheaper. The taste at 1st was different than what I was used too, but is good. Main thing is the price. I couldnt find a better whey protein than this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great size, great price
customer_reviews.text: I like how it’s a mix of whey isolate and whey concentrate, with isolate being the main ingredient. Flavor tastes great, I got the cappuccino one. Great price compared to other brands and mixes easy
customer_reviews.author: Tyler rogers

customer_reviews.title: The flavor
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses this protein powder and asked me to order for him. He was tired of using the flavor he had been using and wanted to try another one. He is satisfied but thinks that all protein powders have a chalky taste to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna

customer_reviews.title: Gainz
customer_reviews.text: I never have an issue with Muscle Pharm protein. Great quality stuff. Gives me exactly the nutrients I need for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Fred

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken protein powder for over 10 years. Just getting back into working out and the taste of the protein shakes are unreal. I am a happy customer and will reorder soon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Best for price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is superb for the price. 25g of high quality whey per serving, nice short ingredient list that is reliably sourced and very little fat or carbs. It could be slightly better with added BCAAs, but to get something any better you would have to fork over quite a bit more. Taste is also great and it mixes quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Pannkuk

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, like vanilla cake batter out of moms bowl! Definitely provides post workout relief from sorrsness, and of course super fast shipping with Amazon prime!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Burke

customer_reviews.title: I just love it! I also use the MP Pre-workout Black ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff for about two years now and just recently switched back to ON 100% Gold Standard Whey to switch it up. I've been using ON for about 8 months now and I think I'm ready to switch back to this stuff! I just love it! I also use the MP Pre-workout Black and LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Price to quality unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: Great protein powder at a great price. The chocolate taste decent (I expect poor taste from protein ) and this one is probably on top 10 best tasting in chocolate flavor. Mixes easy
customer_reviews.author: SYFARHAT

product_meta.title: MusclePharm Combat 100% Whey, Muscle-Building Whey Protein Powder, Chocolate Milk, 5 Pounds, 68 Servings
product_meta.description:
Serious athletes and workout enthusiasts gravitate to MusclePharm 100% Whey Isolate for the pure protein they desire for superior muscle rebuilding, restoration, and growth. Engineered with the highest protein content among leading brands, MusclePharm 100% Whey Protein Isolate delivers 24 grams of high-quality, fast-acting protein per serving—the highest percentage of protein per serving among leading brands. We utilize a low-temperature microfiltration process to protect the protein content, so you get the finest protein supplement in each serving for maximum impact. Our protein powder contains no artificial dyes, zero carbs, zero sugar, and zero fat.

MusclePharm’s Combat 100% Isolate is scientifically engineered to deliver 24 grams of 100% whey protein isolate per 27-gram serving—high-quality protein with no added fillers. After an intense workout session, your muscles are starved for nutrients and need real results fast. Isolates are one of the most refined protein sources, scientifically filtered to remove fats, sugars, and carbohydrates, making them a fast-digesting source of protein and an ideal solution to help deliver superior results.

MusclePharm aims to develop and bring to market the most scientifically advanced and safest nutritional and sports supplementation products possible. The purpose of every MusclePharm product is to enhance athletic performance, strength, and overall personal health—all without the use of banned substances. Our team philosophy is that every product must be a formulation that we, as athletes, believe in and use every day. This product comes in a 5-pound container that contains 68 servings.
feature_bullets: MUSCLE-BUILDING WHEY PROTEIN POWDER: MusclePharm’s Combat 100% Whey is a muscle-building protein powder comprised of high-quality ingredients that help build muscle mass and assist in recovery

AMAZING-TASTING WHEY PROTEIN MIX: Our whey protein 10-pounds chocolate milk mix is easy to mix with milk, almond milk, water, fruit, and vegetables. It tastes great whether simply mixed into a beverage or blended in a smoothie or shake
PACKED WITH PROTEIN: Our muscle-building protein powder is packed with 25 grams of protein, featuring whey protein isolate and whey protein concentrate. It’s also gluten-free
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: All MusclePharm products are backed by a 30-day full money-back guarantee.

BANNED-SUBSTANCE TESTED and certified by Informed-Choice. Athletes who see the Informed-Choice logo on a product can be assured it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure that it is not contaminated with banned substances and is safe to use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
